summary: Senior IT Executive with extensive experience leading enterprise technology, governance, and infrastructure operations across highly regulated, multi-site environments. Proven capability in aligning IT strategy with institutional objectives, maintaining rigorous regulatory compliance, and driving digital enablement. Specialized in enterprise platforms, including Microsoft Dynamics Business Central, and managing multimillion-shilling IT budgets with focused cost optimization. Recognized for establishing resilient disaster recovery frameworks, institutional risk management protocols, and building cross-functional teams to deliver secure, scalable services. Committed to continuous improvement, operational excellence, and data protection in complex enterprise and healthcare training operations.

achievements.text: Optimized IT budgets across 15 business centers, achieving 20% cost savings while enhancing overall service quality and reliability.
Spearheaded Microsoft 365 and Azure cloud adoption, improving collaboration efficiency and reducing downtime across 1,000+ enterprise users.
Delivered enterprise-grade IT services for marquee global clients including AWS, Cisco, DHL, and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, maintaining 99.9% uptime.
Implemented endpoint security and enterprise data protection frameworks, reducing system vulnerabilities by 30% and strengthening ISO 27001 compliance posture.
Established proactive monitoring and disaster recovery systems, reducing average incident resolution time by 40% and ensuring business continuity.
Led and mentored a high-performing IT team across multiple locations, aligning KPIs with operational excellence and client service standards.
Served as technical team lead for the Amazon Web Services launch event in Kenya, overseeing advanced technology deployments and real-time support for high-profile participants.
Led regional IT and network deployment program across 500+ sites, significantly expanding connectivity and bridging the digital divide in underserved communities.
Managed and mentored a team of 15+ engineers and technicians, improving delivery efficiency and ensuring consistent project execution across multiple regions.
Oversaw multi-million-shilling IT infrastructure budgets with strict cost controls, achieving cost savings through optimized OEM procurement (Huawei, Nokia, Cisco, Ericsson).
Standardized compliance and safety frameworks (ISO, OHS, Pre-PAT), reducing project risks and improving delivery quality across all deployment sites.
Integrated proactive monitoring tools into deployed infrastructure, enabling preventive maintenance and reducing downtime incidents across the regional network.
Designed and implemented a digital filing system for 50,000+ regulatory records, improving accessibility, compliance, and audit readiness.
Contributed to Information Security Management System (ISMS) activities in support of ISO 27001 compliance and institutional data protection.
Supported regulatory compliance by processing license applications and renewals, ensuring alignment with national ICT regulations.
Supported management of communication, navigation, and surveillance systems critical to aviation safety and regulatory compliance.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Science in Telecommunication & Information Technology
